description: This Java class defines the 'NoteEditActivity', an Android activity responsible for editing or creating notes. It manages UI components for note title and content, interacts with a NoteViewModel to perform data operations, and handles user actions such as saving or deleting a note.

classes.name: NoteEditActivity
classes.description: Android activity class for editing or creating notes, providing UI handling, data binding with ViewModel, and menu actions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the theme and layout, binds UI components, and loads existing note data if available.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu and adjusts menu items visibility based on activity state.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections for saving or deleting the note.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Validates input and saves a new note or updates an existing note through the ViewModel.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the current note via the ViewModel if it exists.
